snippet: Though the fire has been deemed suspicious, investigators have found no evidence of an accelerant at an apartment where the woman died early Saturday.
abstract: Lorena Escalera, 25, of Brooklyn dies in an apartment fire that is deemed suspicious by police.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Though the fire has been deemed suspicious, investigators have found no evidence of an accelerant at an apartment where the woman died early Saturday.

headline.seo: Woman in Group of Transgender Performers Dies in Brooklyn Fire
headline.main: Woman Dies in a Brooklyn Fire That Is Deemed Suspicious
headline.print_headline: Woman Dies in a Brooklyn Fire That Is Deemed Suspicious
